p: Grooved peg sensilla (GPS) are among the less represented sensilla on the antennae of S. zeamais. While their presence was completely neglected in the previous studies, here we report for the first time their presence. Morphologically speaking, GPS show the same structural features already reported for other insect species, for which a role in the detection of volatiles [ 63, 64, 65] as well as a function such as thermo/chemosensory receptors or thermo-hygroreceptors [ 66].
